name: SIMON OSSALE
intro: Welcome to my portfolio! I am a freelance web developer specializing in creating high-performance and innovative digital solutions. Passionate about modern technologies, I excel in both front-end and back-end development, with a focus on creating elegant and intuitive user interfaces.
introAbout: I am Simon Ossale, a passionate full-stack web developer specializing in the creation of modern and high-performance digital solutions. As a freelancer, I support businesses, startups, and entrepreneurs in their projects by offering personalized services tailored to their needs and objectives.
ExpertiseDescription: With expertise in modern technologies like React.js and Spring Boot, I design and develop robust, intuitive applications tailored to users' specific needs.

experience.title: Experience
experience.job2_desc: Front-End Developer at Carthage Development Solutions.

frontend.title: Frontend Web Developer
frontend.description: Designing and developing modern, responsive user interfaces using technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, Sass, JavaScript, React.js,Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap.
frontend.modal_description: I am passionate about web development, focusing on creating modern, responsive, and intuitive user interfaces. My goal is to provide elegant and high-performance solutions tailored to each project's needs.

offer.2: Development of user interfaces with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript
offer.3: Integration of modern frameworks like React.js and Bootstrap
offer.4: Performance and SEO optimization for better visibility
offer.5: Close collaboration with backend teams for smooth integration

backend.title: Backend Web Developer
backend.description: Building and managing robust backend systems using Java with Spring Boot, PHP, and databases for optimal performance and smooth integration.
backend.modal_description: Specializing in designing and managing high-performance, secure backend systems, I use modern technologies like Java with Spring Boot, PHP, and relational. My goal is to ensure optimal performance and seamless integration with frontend interfaces.

offer.1: Design of robust, scalable backend systems
offer.2: Development of RESTful APIs for service communication
offer.4: Optimization of application performance and security
offer.5: Collaboration with frontend teams for full synergy

ux.title: UI/UX Designer
ux.description: Creating visually appealing designs and user experiences with Figma to ensure engaging and intuitive interfaces for your users.
ux.modal_description: With expertise in UI/UX design, I create engaging, visually appealing, and intuitive interfaces that enhance user experience. Using tools like Figma and Canva, I ensure a seamless transition from design to development for web applications and websites.

offer.1: Creation of mockups, prototypes, posters, flyers and UI kits
offer.3: UX research and analysis to optimize user behavior
offer.4: Branding and UI/UX designs for applications and websites
offer.5: Close collaboration with developers for seamless integration

portfolioGlobal.title: Latest
portfolioGlobal.demoLinks: View the demo on my YouTube channel

project1.title: Portfolio
project1.description: A modern and interactive website designed to showcase your projects, skills, and services, while allowing visitors to easily contact you.
project1.modalDescription: Explore a showcase of creative projects developed with passion and precision.
featureOption: Responsive design suitable for all devices.
project1.role: As the lead developer, I designed the user interface, integrated external libraries, and implemented a functional contact form.
librariesAndCDN: Font Awesome: Used to integrate a collection of customizable vector icons, visually enriching the interface and guiding users in their interactions with the site.
Google Fonts: Used to import modern and harmonious typefaces, ensuring optimal readability and a consistent visual identity across the entire site.
ScrollReveal: Used to add scroll-triggered animations, enhancing the appearance of elements on the screen and making the browsing experience more engaging.
Typed: Used to implement a typewriter effect in text presentations, capturing visitors' attention and adding an interactive touch to the site.
i18next: Used to manage the internationalization of the application, allowing content to be offered in multiple languages and reaching a wider audience.
i18next-http-backend: Used to dynamically load translation files from the server, facilitating the management and updating of multilingual content.
Axios: Used to make HTTP requests in a simple and efficient manner, allowing data (such as JSON files) to be fetched and manipulated asynchronously and securely.

project2.title: Train D
project2.description: A web application to manage team projects and tasks.
project2.modalDescription: An interactive application designed for efficient team collaboration on projects and tasks.
project2.role: I designed the user interface, integrated the backend API, and managed the state with Redux.
modernAnimations: Transition animations with React Transition Group

project3.description: A web application to manage team projects and tasks.
project3.modalDescription: An interactive application designed for efficient team collaboration on projects and tasks.
project3.role: I designed the user interface, integrated the backend API, and managed the state with Redux.
